parameters.name: Format
parameters.description: Format in which to display all bend notes in this drawing view of a sheet metal part (see Remarks )

title: IView.SetBendNoteTextFormat
description: Sets the text format of all bend notes in this drawing view of a sheet metal part.

parameters.name: Format
parameters.description: Format in which to display all bend notes in this drawing view of a sheet metal part (see Remarks )

returns: True if format is successfully set, false if not
remarks:
Before calling this method, call
IView::GetBendNoteAttributeString
to specify Format.
